Title: The Understudy
Plot: George and Jerry are suspected by the cast and Kramer of deliberately injuring Bette Midler during a softball game, giving Jerry's girlfriend, Bette's understudy, a chance to perform. Kramer becomes Bette's personal assistant. Elaine gets George's father to translate for her when she suspects that her manicurist has made some obvious snide remarks in a foreign tongue. While crying about losing her manicurists, Elaine meets the owner of a catalog, J. Peterman, and gets herself a new job.
GuestStars: Jerry Stiller, John O'Hurley, Bette Midler, June Kyoto Lu, Amy Hill, Adelaide Miller, Alexandra Bokyun Chun, Vonnie C. Rhee, Craig Thomas, Michael McDonald, Lou DiMaggio, Jason Beck, Bob Shaw, Johnny Silver, Willi
